disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Double Strike.

blurb.value: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.

description.value: Innate: Master Yi gains a stack of Double Strike for every basic attack on-hit within 4 seconds of each other. At 3 stacks, Master Yi's next basic attack on-attack within 4 seconds consumes the stacks to strike twice, the second strike dealing 50% AD physical damage.

description2.value: The second strike applies on-attack and on-hit effects at full effect and is affected by critical strike modifiers.

description3.value: If Master Yi's primary target is killed before the second strike, he automatically attacks another enemy within 300 range.

description4.value: The second strike can critically strike structures.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Since Double Strike resets the counter on-attack and the second strike applies on-hit effects, the second strike is able to add a stack for the next Double Strike activation. If Double Strike's target becomes untargetable shortly after the triggering attack, it will still occur and deal its effects as usual.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Alpha Strike.

blurb.value: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to minions and monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.

description.value: Active: Master Yi vanishes and, after 0.231 seconds, marks the target enemy and then moves to mark the nearest visible un-marked enemy within 600 units, recurring up to 3 times, once every 0.231 seconds.

description2.value: Upon finishing marking, or if there are no longer any targetable enemies, he reappears「 after 0.165 seconds 」「 1.087 seconds after the start of the cast with 4 bounces 」in front of his target's current location and deals physical damage to all marked enemies, increased against monsters. If his target dies or gets too far away during the delay, he will reappear at the cast location instead.

description3.value: If there are no other un-marked enemies in range, he may strike the same enemies again, dealing 25% damage instantly.

leveling3.value:
Reduced Damage:»6.25 / 15 / 23.75 / 32.5 / 41.25 (+ 25% AD)«Reduced Monster Damage:25 / 40 / 55 / 70 / 85 (+ 25% AD)
Maximum Single-Target Damage:»43.75 / 105 / 166.25 / 227.5 / 288.75 (+ 175% AD)«Max Monster Single-Target Damage:175 / 280 / 385 / 490 / 595 (+ 175% AD)

description4.value: Alpha Strike's primary and lesser damage can critically strike for (60% +  15%) AD bonus physical damage and (15% +  3.75%) AD bonus physical damage respectively.

description5.value: Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's  cooldown by 1 second.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Alpha Strike's primary damage applies after Master Yi reappears. Alpha Strike's  cooldown reduction applies on structures but not when Master Yi is blinded. When Master Yi bounces from a unit it will grant vision in a 600 radius around it for up-until 0.627 seconds after Alpha Strike ends, including across terrain, though not into brushes. It will always grant vision around the primary target even if he doesn't bounce off it. Alpha Strike's damage is calculated the moment the mark is placed. Because of this it is possible to inflict differing amounts of damage if Master Yi changes his AD in the middle of Alpha Strike. Master Yi will follow all his primary target's movements. Alpha Strike can only follow up-to 2000 units; If the target teleports a very long distance, it will not be followed. Master Yi can use summoner spells with the exceptions of Flash, Teleport, Hexflash, and Mark / Dash during Alpha Strike. If the primary target is a champion Master Yi will automatically attack it once Alpha Strike ends, and thus Master Yi will not be able to buffer other abilities.* Spell shield will only block a single instance of damage. If Master Yi dies during Alpha Strike and he is only focusing one target, the ability will only deal the reduced damage strikes and not the final tick of damage from reappearing. If he is striking multiple targets the damage will be dealt immediately when dying, and if he dies before the bounce from the last target, Alpha Strike will deal reduced damage only to all units he already bounced from.* If Master Yi enters resurrection during Alpha Strike and he is only focusing one target, the ability will deal the reduced damage strikes as normal and the final tick of damage after being resurrected. If he is striking multiple targets, Alpha Strike will sometimes deal the reduced damage from repeated bounces and the main damage after being resurrected, and sometimes only the reduced damage, unrelated to the number of targets available.*
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Meditate.

blurb.value: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.

description.value: Active: Master Yi channels for up to 4 seconds, healing himself every 0.5 seconds, increased by 0% − 100% (based on missing health).

leveling.value: Minimum Healing Per Half Second:»15 / 25 / 35 / 45 / 55 (+ 12.5% AP)«Maximum Healing Per Half Second:30 / 50 / 70 / 90 / 110 (+ 25% AP)Minimum Total Healing:»120 / 200 / 280 / 360 / 440 (+ 100% AP)«Maximum Total Healing:240 / 400 / 560 / 720 / 880 (+ 200% AP)

description2.value: While channeling, Master Yi reduces incoming damage, halved against turrets, pauses Wuju Style's and Highlander's duration, and grants one stack of Double Strike per second.

description3.value: After the channel ends, Master Yi reduces incoming damage for another 0.25 seconds, with lesser effectiveness against non-turret damage but greater effectiveness vs turret damage. *

leveling3.value: Post-Channel Damage Reduction:»40 / 37.5 / 35 / 32.5 / 30%«Post-Channel Turret Damage Reduction:70 / 68.75 / 67.5 / 66.25 / 65%

description4.value: Meditate resets Master Yi's basic attack timer.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Meditate's healing amount updates dynamically as he heals himself, making Master Yi heal for less as his current health increases. The following table refers for interactions while Master Yi is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Interrupts Abilities Interrupts Movement Interrupts Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled Hextech Protobelt-01 Interrupted by All item-actives not specified above interrupt Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Disabled N/A Interrupted by Flash Teleport Recall Hexflash Interrupted by Death Silencing effects

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Wuju Style.

blurb.value: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.

description.value: Active: Master Yi empowers his sword, causing his basic attacks to deal  bonus true damage for 5 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Wuju Style's bonus true damage does not interact with critical strikes nor does it affect structures. Wuju Style's bonus true damage cannot be blocked but can be dodged and/or missed if Master Yi is blinded.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Highlander.

blurb.value: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.

description.value: Passive: Champion takedowns reduce the current  cooldown of Master Yi's basic abilities by 70%.

description2.value: Active: Master Yi cleanses himself of all slows and cripples. For the next 7 seconds, he is ghosted, gains  bonus attack speed and  bonus movement speed, and becomes slow-immune and immune to cripples.

leveling2.value:
Bonus Attack Speed:25 / 35 / 45 / 55 / 65%
Bonus Movement Speed:35 / 40 / 45 / 50 / 55%

description3.value: While active, champion takedowns extend the duration of Highlander by 7 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value:
* There are two situations that can happen if Master Yi uses Highlander while Highlander's buff is active.
 If the buff's duration is under 7 seconds, the buff refreshes to 7 seconds.
 If the buff's duration is above 7 seconds nothing happens.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
